p: As much as NSAIDs (non-steroidal antiinflammatory drugs) are not recommended (aspirin, ibuprofen, naproxene and indomethacin), possibly because of concomitant inhibition of PGD2, known to be elevated in elderly patients, and further elevated by SARS-CoV infection and in more severe forms of COVID-19 ( 73); however PGD2 has protective, anti-inflammatory actions, and blocking cyclooxygenase (COX) also inhibits PGD2, which further imbalances an already malfunctioning immune response.
